body_html: We evaluated adding batchnorm into DNNClassifier/Regressor. For the sake of minimal configuration parameters, we decided not to add. As a workaround users can copy the model_fn of DNNClassifier and modifies it to add batchnorm.
body_text: We evaluated adding batchnorm into DNNClassifier/Regressor. For the sake of minimal configuration parameters, we decided not to add. As a workaround users can copy the model_fn of DNNClassifier and modifies it to add batchnorm.
